name: Sabo
text:
Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[On Play] Your characters can't be KOD by card effects until the start of your next turn. Draw 2 trash 2.

effect.text: Your characters can't be KOD by card effects until the start of your next turn. Draw 2 trash 2.

meta.notes: The card is a sample. The text and abilities are based on the visible content. The 'Blocker' keyword is a printed ability with a description in parentheses.
